Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: All rates at this hotel include complimentary in-room high speed Internet access

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: The Smithsonian Institution - World's largest museum and research complex, housing 19 museums

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Walter E Washington Convention Center - located 6 blocks from the hotel

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: The Verizon Center - sports and event arena located 2 blocks from the hotel

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: The National Mall - the heart of the Nation's Capital - lined with monumnets, memorials & museums

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Government Agencies - D.C. is the seat of U.S. government with federal agencies residing here

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Arts & Entertainment - D.C.'s entertainment options include theaters, sports venues, nightlife

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Complimentary in-room high-speed & Wi-Fi internet access and Wi-Fi in public spaces.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Professional and knowledgeable sales staff ready to assist with your group/business needs

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: 24 hour complimentary access to the business center

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Located in the heart of the Nation's Capital, the Fairfield Inn & Suites Washington, DC/Downtown is a completely renovated property boasting 198 elegantly appointed guest rooms and suites. Our hotel is just steps away from the Verizon Center and Judiciary Square, a 6 block walk from the Walter E. Washington Convention Center and 2 blocks from the Gallery Place/Chinatown metro station servicing the yellow, red and green lines. Nestled in Chinatown - one of Washington, DC's most vibrant neighborhoods - the Fairfield Inn & Suites is also conveniently close to museums, national landmarks and attractions such as: The White House, Smithsonian Institution, the National Mall, Washington Monument, U.S. Capitol and Lincoln Memorial. All this without sacrificing stylish comfort and a great value (complimentary breakfast can be enjoyed each morning as well as internet access during your stay). We invite you to come and experience the only Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott located in the Washington, DC city center.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: The Fairfield Inn & Suites Washington, DC/Downtown is in heart of the Nation's Capital. With easy access from Reagan National, Dulles and BWI airports. Near Gallery Place Metro, Verizon Center, the National Mall, DC Courthouses and government offices.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Mix of Classic Pub food and excellent & friendly service
